404.errorMessage: The URL you entered may be broken, or the page has been removed. <2>Go back to the home page</2>

dataDictionary.title: New Relic data dictionary
dataDictionary.intro: This data dictionary defines some of our default-reported data stored in NRDB and queryable via NRQL. This includes events like Transaction, MobileRequest, and BrowserInteraction, and our Metric, Log, and Span data types. These definitions are also available from our query builder UI by mousing over applicable data type and attribute names.
introNot: Data from our infrastructure integrations (for that, see docs for a specific integration)
Detailed integration-specific attributes for Metric data
dataDictionary.callout: This dictionary does not contain data reported by Infrastructure integrations. To learn about that data, see the <2>integration documentation</2>.

home.getStarted: Get started in four easy steps

onBoarding.text: Orient yourself to our comprehensive monitoring and observability platform.
onBoarding.title: Introduction to New Relic

onBoarding.text: Jump into the UI and set up New Relic to instrument your tech stack.
onBoarding.title: Install New Relic

onBoarding.text: Common ways to use New Relic to solve real-world problems.
onBoarding.title: Tutorials

t1.title: Monitor all your apps and services

tiles.title: Start your New Relic journey
tiles.text: Get to know New Relic and the capabilities we offer.

tiles.title: Tutorials and walkthroughs
tiles.text: Use our hand-crafted tutorials to step through solutions to common problems.

tiles.title: Guides and best practices
tiles.text: Learn more about our platform UI and mobile apps.

tiles.title: AI monitoring
tiles.text: Monitor your AI stack for latency, response times, compliance, and cost efficiency.

tiles.title: Application performance monitoring (APM)
tiles.text: Monitor application performance across your stack. Weâ€™ve got agents for Go, Java, .NET,  Node.js, PHP, Python, and Ruby.

tiles.title: Browser monitoring
tiles.text: Gain insight into how your website is performing and how your users are using your site.

tiles.title: Infrastructure monitoring
tiles.text: Get visibility into hosts, containers, providers, network, and  infrastructure.

tiles.title: Kubernetes monitoring
tiles.text: Observe the complete health and performance of your clusters and workloads.

tiles.title: Log management
tiles.text: Organize all your logs in one place, with support for common log forwarding tools. Includes privacy, parsing, and logs archives for long-term storage.

tiles.title: Mobile monitoring
tiles.text: Get performance insights for your mobile apps, from frontend experience to backend execution metrics.

tiles.title: Model performance monitoring (MLOps)
tiles.text: Analyze the performance and effectiveness of machine learning models.

tiles.title: Network monitoring
tiles.text: Analyze, optimize, and troubleshoot your routers, switches, and other networking devices.

tiles.title: OpenTelemetry
tiles.text: Instrument your service with OpenTelemetry and gain platform-agnostic observability.

tiles.title: Serverless function monitoring
tiles.text: Monitor your serverless AWS Lambda functions using both CloudWatch data and code-level instrumentation.

tiles.title: Streaming Video & Ads
tiles.text: Monitor and optimize video and ad streaming performance with intelligent insights into quality of experience metrics.

tiles.title: Synthetic monitoring
tiles.text: Simulate end-user activity and API calls from locations around the world, so you can find problems before your users do.

tiles.title: Website performance monitoring
tiles.text: Keep your websites fast and error-free, improve your customer experience, and your conversion rates.

tiles.title: Alerts
tiles.text: Alert on incidents and anomalies to fix issues before they impact your customers or your business.

tiles.title: Change tracking
tiles.text: Track changes in your system, like deployments, to see how they affect performance

tiles.title: Charts, dashboards, and querying
tiles.text: Use charts and dashboards to visualize your data. Start with our pre-built dashboards or use our powerful query tools to build your own.

tiles.title: CodeStream
tiles.text: Bring performance monitoring into your IDE to improve your software before you commit it to production.

tiles.title: Distributed tracing
tiles.text: See how data flows across your system and pinpoint where things are getting slowed down. Find, fix, and optimize system and application performance.

tiles.title: Errors inbox
tiles.text: Find, share, and fix software development errors in one place.

tiles.title: NRQL
tiles.text: Dig deep into your data with our New Relic Query Language (NRQL) and get precise answers and data-driven insights.

tiles.title: Service level management
tiles.text: Set and measure SLIs and SLOs to see how your teams and key business metrics are performing.

tiles.title: Interactive Application Security Testing (IAST)
tiles.text: Find, verify, and fix high-risk vulnerabilities throughout your software development lifecycle. Fully integrated with vulnerability management.

tiles.title: Security RX
tiles.text: Audit your application, infrastructure entities, software libraries, or OS distribution and packages for security vulnerabilities and take action to remediate and reduce risk.

tiles.title: Release notes
tiles.text: Stay current with all of our latest releases. Includes RSS feeds.

tiles.title: What's new?
tiles.text: Stay up to date about our new features, updates, and changes in our platform.

tiles.title: Account & user management
tiles.text: Go here for all your account, user management, pricing, and billing needs.

tiles.title: Data and APIs
tiles.text: Learn more about NRDB, our New Relic database, as well as details about metric and event data types, how we manage data, and how to use our APIs.

tiles.title: Data dictionary
tiles.text: Look up definitions for our attributes in a variety of data sources and data types.

tiles.title: Security and privacy
tiles.text: Learn how New Relic handles data security and privacy, and about our compliance certification.

tiles.title: Licenses
tiles.text: A reference library of our licenses and other legal documentation.

machineTranslation.calloutHeading: This machine translation is provided for your convenience.
machineTranslation.calloutBody: In the event of any inconsistency between the English version and the translated version, the <2>English version</2> shall prevail. Please visit <6>this page</6> for more information.

installFeedback.question: Did this doc help with your installation?
installFeedback.prompt: Tell us how can we do this better.
installFeedback.emailDisclaimer: We'll only use this email for follow-up questions about your feedback.

surveyModal.npsIntro: How likely are you to recommend our docs to a friend or colleague?

suprQ.intro: Please rate how much you agree or disagree with the following statements:
suprQ.q1: The information on the docs site is credible.
suprQ.q2: The information in the docs is trustworthy.
suprQ.q3: The docs site is easy to use.
suprQ.q4: The docs site has a clean and simple presentation.
suprQ.q5: I will likely visit the docs site in the future.
suprQ.q6: It's easy to navigate within the docs.
suprQ.q7: I found the docs site to be attractive.
suprQ.q8: New Relic's docs read as if a friend is explaining things to me.

surveyModal.freeTextQuestion: Is there anything that you would change about New Relic docs? If so, please tell us what and why.
